sections.heading: Wild Game Preserve; firearms, hunting, and fishing prohibited
sections.text: Except as provided in section 37-713, it shall be unlawful for any person to carry firearms, hunt, or fish within the limits of the State Wild Game Preserve.SourceLaws 1927, c. 30, § 3, p. 147;C.S.1929, § 37-417;R.S.1943, § 37-417;Laws 19

37-712.State Wild Game Preserve; firearms, hunting, and fishing prohibited.

Except as provided in section 37-713, it shall be unlawful for any person to carry firearms, hunt, or fish within the limits of the State Wild Game Preserve.

SourceLaws 1927, c. 30, § 3, p. 147;C.S.1929, § 37-417;R.S.1943, § 37-417;Laws 1961, c. 169, § 4, p. 503;R.S.1943, (1993), § 37-417;Laws 1998, LB 922, § 326.
